website_summaries.verdict: If you have your heart set on a 4K Samsung TV but not a high price tag, this 50-inch model is worth considering.
pros: Features 4K resolution at a reasonable price
Smart technology is responsive and makes streaming easy
120Hz refresh rate is appreciated by avid gamers who like fast action
Setup is simple, and the remote is straightforward to operate
cons: The 50-inch screen is somewhat smaller than others we considered, and viewing angles could be better
But for the price, you may not mind

website_summaries.verdict: Delivers beautiful images and responsive smart features in a modern-looking 50-inch model.
pros: Offers smart technology that makes streaming your favorite apps easy
Picture quality offers excellent contrast and a motion rate that's perfect for action movies and sports as well as gaming
cons: Sound is tinny and lacks balance and bass

website_summaries.verdict: Offers almost everything viewers love in a TV in a streamlined 49-inch model – great picture, convenient features, and smart technology.
pros: Samsung's updated 49-inch smart TV delivers exceptionally vivid 4K UHD images with vibrant colors
Ultra-thin design fits nicely in most spaces
Pairs easily with your phone for smart control
Three HDMI inputs and 120 Hz refresh for your gaming needs
cons: Remote that comes with it isn't smart, but since control can be activated with a smartphone, this isn't a deal-breaker

customer_reviews.title: Fancy schmancy
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful picture television we've ever owned, as a 30-something couple. Incredibly easy set-up, intuitive operation, and gorgeously clear picture. Granted, we're penny-pinchers, so this was a big splurge for us, even though it's far less pricey than other comparable televisions. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sssaucie

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal green line new
customer_reviews.text: Used this flatscreen for a few hours in the first day. Next day it had a beautiful green lineon the screen on the left third horizontal. Sent back. Taking a chance on another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Little

customer_reviews.title: LED backlight problems.
customer_reviews.text: Twenty days in and there is a dark band covering the top 25% of the screen. This seems to be a widespread problem with Samsung TVs. A google search turned up numerous reports of this exact problem, where a linear dark band covers the top half of the screen. Seems to be "hit or miss" whether you'll get a good set or not.
customer_reviews.author: dfoxer

customer_reviews.title: Had older Samsung better than this.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection doesn’t work. Unable to connect to any other audio besides speakers. Can’t connect any mouse or keyboard and navigating with remote is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: yancarlos m.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this because previous TV wouldn’t stop freezing. Had this one about a month and works great so far. I don’t really use the “Smart” features but it has all of that stuff. I downloaded the MLB app and streamed a free game and the picture was amazing. Then the season ended. Very nice and small bezel all around. Tiny red LED light on underside (next to power button) when TV is off. (Last TV had a big red light facing forward). I got the 50” and it was lightweight enough for me to mount to the wall by myself, but I am not small. Would recommend that most people will need 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: connected to PC refresh rate is only 30hz
customer_reviews.text: disappointed, thought I was getting a 120hz tv, not some made up 120 motion rate. False / deceptive advertising
customer_reviews.author: RLEII

customer_reviews.title: HDMI would cut out.
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI would constantly cut out when attached to a TIVO. Even when I changed a channel I had to unplug and replug the TIVO. The picture was fair and would cut off the heads of people on some HD stations. Also the mounting holes are too close together. Samsung missed the mark on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Licht

customer_reviews.title: Super quality and best price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. Can't go wrong with Samsung. A little big for my room but spend most my time here. Love the smart TV
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Hughes

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: TV came not functioning, had to get it repaired. Two of the circuit boards were Dead On Arrival and had to be replaced. Make sure you can use a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good inexpensive UHD TV for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: This price dropped so I pounced on the 50 inch. Hooked it up to an XBOX One X and played Red Dead 2 and it was absolutely amazing. Everything is so sharp and brilliant. Tried Battlefield V for a little bit and it was just as vibrant and beautiful. Highly recommend for a gamer.
customer_reviews.author: David Hallowes

customer_reviews.title: 4K TV excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great TV.. were so happy with it. Great sound. The only thing I don't like are the preloaded apps.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Johnny Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The TV just arrived and I have it setup and the remote is defective. I can power the TV on using the button on the TV. I changed out the batteries with new batteries and the remote doesn't function. I checked the remote using the camera on my phone and no IR light is emitted when pressing the buttons. I double checked to make sure the batteries were inserted correctly and they are correct according to the diagram on the inside of the remote. The batteries work fine in the old TV's remote.
customer_reviews.author: Aal

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious buying a Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week couldn't get the Wi-Fi to work for streaming called up for technical support. It was as helpful as the not even calling. It was a very complicated week
customer_reviews.author: landslide

customer_reviews.title: No audio out connection
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a low rating because, for an expensive TV, it doesn't have an audio out connection to use with my wireless headphones so I can watch TV without disturbing anyone else. My 40 inch Samsung did. It wouldn't be bad if it had Bluetooth but, of course, it doesn't have that either. Come on, guys, give us one or the other. But neither. That's unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Papa

customer_reviews.title: Broken and dead after 9 months of use.  Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This tv, when it worked, which was seldom, was great! But about 3 months after I got it, it started disconnecting from the internet at random times, usually when we were in the middle of a movie or show! I could get it to reconnect by pulling out the power cord and then putting it back in, but today, it just went black, and has never come back on. Sigh. What a piece of garbage. I guess if you're looking to throw away $500, this is the tv for you. But I'm now looking at TVs on Amazon again, and will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great TV on try number 2
customer_reviews.text: First one that showed up had been dropped somewhere and the outer frame separated causing light to shine through when turned on. Amazon's chat response was for me to take it apart and glue it...... Not a TV repairman. After second call they replaced it. The second showed up with the box falling apart on the UPS truck. Took the two hours to set it up and and guess what, so far it looks great. Love the functionality built in for going cableless although I am worried about it longevity considering the condition it showed up in. SOMEONE NEEDS TO CHANGE THE SHIPPING PACKAGING, IT IS HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Gendron

customer_reviews.title: Great value, awesome picture
customer_reviews.text: This is my first new TV since 2014 and it’s awesome. Setup was quick and easy and I followed some instructions I found online to fine-tune the picture for both games and movies. I was not impressed the Samsung left out the bolts required to mount the feet to the tv and it’s not a standard bolt but I went to Lowe’s and found something that worked. Also, the bolts you need to wall mount are some Samsun-specific weird bolt that also was not available at Lowe’s. That’s the only complaint I have though. I didn’t rate the sound because I have it hooked up to a receiver with Bose speakers. What a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: I have two 55 inch TVs, one is from Samsung, another is from TCL. The picture quality are the same, but TCL is cheaper. TCL offer better value/dollar in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Barne

customer_reviews.title: nice tv
customer_reviews.text: this is a great tv. it works well. it comes on when I push the button. It goes off when I push the button. the included remote saves me lots of time from having to walk up to the tv to push buttons. Its called a smart TV because the people that buy it are really smart. I guess that's why its called the smart tv. I walked around the Harvard campus once, and I think that made me smart. if you read my review this far, you have to be laughing. I did buy this tv, and I like it. I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: love the tv, appreciate the seller
customer_reviews.text: ordered this tv, got it all set up, turned it on and there was a giant black line down the middle. contacted the seller immediately, they didn't ask any questions or give me any hassle just set up the return and shipped a new one right away without even getting the old one. the tv itself is awesome, I've had it for 6 months now and actually prefer the built in smart feature to my Apple TV extremely simple, this is my second Samsung and they continue to improve, great picture, 4/5 sound it definitely does the job
customer_reviews.author: Brett Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the value and features!
customer_reviews.text: I don't watch TV, but mainly use it for streaming or gaming. However, this is a great Samsung TV and it definitely delivers. Had great quality, but it's not like crystal-OLED great if you know what I mean. It does have wireless connectivity like when you want to wirelessly connect a laptop to it or even a smart device. My remote DOESN'T have quick-access app buttons like Netflix or Amazon. Just a standard setup, with some programable buttons and decent keypad. Great size for me, but if you want a bigger do your research! Thank You Amazon and Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Saraceno

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV! I shopped around, and of course all store retailers could not beat this price. I had a challenge getting the TV in that TWO were sent and I couldn't stop the order (after less than 30 minutes of ordering). But I did get the refund. The TV was really easy to install. I thought I'd need help but did it all myself! Which is huge news for a person who hasn't owned a TV in more than a decade. I'd recommend this TV to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Taft

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good TV
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and sounds good. I can sometimes see blurriness when watching a football game. Sometimes when there is fast movement there's a slight blur.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry Finn

customer_reviews.title: The ads are annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It has ads on the home screen that are sorta annoying and you cant get rid of them. Otherwise the picture quality is good. The only other thing is the remote and TV dont really respond well with each other when you turn the power on. Sometimes the TV will turn on, but it wont have all the functionality of the home screen, so you'll have to turn it off and then back on to get everything to work right.
customer_reviews.author: Coral Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Failed at 3 months / Screen cracked after adjusting wall mount
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months, then the screen cracked internally after we moved the on its wall mount to adjust the angle. This tv screen is cheap in both cost, value and quality. It is too fragile to actually be used and I cannot recommend it for any location where it needs to be physically handled in any way. We pursued a warranty claim with Samsung but they rejected it claiming "physical damage". I will not be buying another Samsung television and will probably go with a higher priced Sony or Vizio.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT FINE - DELIVERY A SHAMBLES!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this equipment for a new home and specified a delivery date when I knew I would be there to receive it. It would appear that nobody bothered to read, or act on, the delivery date. The large, expensive, TV was left on the doorstep for three days in Oregon's VERY unpredictable weather; luckily not stolen. On several occasions, I tried to get the delivery date changed, after getting the shipping notice, but Amazon's "Customer Service" staff was totally inept and unresponsive - and provided a "Couldn't care less" attitude about the delivery. The TV works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Armstrong-Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, cumbersome remote
customer_reviews.text: I got this during the Amazon days. Hadn't thought to buy a new TV, but it was a good deal. I was very impressed with the picture! The Smart functions work well, unlike a much older Samsung I had. I hook a Mac mini to the screen to watch shows online/check mail and the image is fine, but the best picture quality comes in via the Smart functions. The only drawback to this TV is the unfriendly design of the remote--a common issue with Samsung. It works fine, but it isn't designed to be hand-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Esposito

customer_reviews.title: great TV
customer_reviews.text: going from a 40" to this 50" significant size change no headphone jack or audio out jack my fault for not checking my current soundbar old school ran off of an audio out hack I am going to buy a new soundbar. no big deal. easier to use my 40" samsung remote - it is bigger with larger buttons. the new 50" remote is cram-packed with buttons so tiny you are constantly hitting the neighboring buttons. Otherwise very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL CARRINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and great sound, plus pretty simple features to use. I really love the TV. It replaced a plasma that weighed about 100 lbs. this one I can move by myself. Only draw back is the remote, the battery cover does not fit or stay on. That sucks I need to check if Samsung will replace it but they do well it is not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walther

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year and no response from the seller. Buy ROKU
customer_reviews.text: Lasted, like 1 year, almost to the exact day I bought it ... can't remember when it arrives. It developed a dark band from the top to the bottom of the screen, about 6 - 8" wide. Sent a request to the seller. No reply. I will buy a ROKU tv ... I have 2 already, and they put this one to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no bluetooth and audio output does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but limited. No bluetooth and the audio output does not work!!! I called everyone in support for service and all gave vague answers but since i m an tech guy i know that they covering these two faults of this particular model. Bluetooth will never work even if you buy the 'compatible ' taotronics audio-bluetooth converter and the audio output will show you that there is signal but no external speaker or sound bar will work . I m ok with the factory built in sound but if you looking for better and or more sound you are not going to get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: stoly

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third smart TV & by far the easiest to set up. Just plug it in and follow the easy to understand instructions that automatically pop up when the TV is turned on. Picture very clear & great depth of field. Connecting to Amazon Prime also without problems. Never owned a Samsung before, but am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Quality good price
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking this very much. I upgraded from 46” and it looks great. Had some trouble setting up with Samsung.com but using the remote worked fine. I was disappointed that the apps did not have CBS all access, which I got through Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: John Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: JUNK, WARRANTY SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: DIED AFTER 16 WEEKS! Samsung 'repair' person replaced components with different television. Now I have a cheap $200 TV. Will NEVER BUY FROM THEM AGAIN! And I'm considering canceling Amazon account!
customer_reviews.author: GardenerPerson

customer_reviews.title: Okay tv.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the tv turns itself on occasionally. Sometimes in the middle of the night. Very annoying. Called Samsung. Got no answers as to why this happens. Great picture viewing from front but if u want to view tv at an angle don’t buy it. Picture is distorted from side viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. It was good while it lasted. And that wasnt very long.
customer_reviews.text: The remote and smart interface are nice. The picture quality is amazing but these tvs are garbage as far as whats behind the screen. Had mine s little under 2 years and the backlight on right side blew. Can only really sse half the screen now. Top to it all off i paid for the 4 year warranty. Today the offered me a replacment tv. That is worth almosft 400 dollars less than what i paid for this and the warranty. I feel robbed. Owned 3 Samsung hdtvs snd while their picture quality is amazing. Only one had a lifespan longet than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Justin.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy a Samsung TV from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: All inputs failed after 7 months. Amazon doesn't accept returns after 90 days, so I have been dealing with Samsung warranty people for 3 months. It took from late August until October 10 to get exchange approved, and nothing has happened since then. I have been on the phone multiple times on hold for 45 to 90 minutes while agents review claim, then forward to case managers who do the same, but nothing happens despite promises it is resolved. DO NOT buy a Samsung product through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: RCH

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up the smart tv features, fantastic picture quality!! Love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a techie, so this may not be helpful to many, but the TV has a beautiful, vivid picture. Its a good size for an average size room, its easy to set up and use, the remote us self explsnitory, and its attractive with a narrow frame and slim legs. I love it compared to our last TV. The price was good, and it was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: WeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: Display quality, sound, and the user interface seem to be quite good. However, the screen broke 35 days after it was delivered. Now there large section of the screen which flickers the entire time the tv is in use. All made worse by the fact Amazon won't allow a return past 30 days. I've been trying to get assistance from someone at Samsung to either repair or replace but have been disappointed by the customer support as well.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: The TV is fine, but the warranty is missing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an extended warranty for this unit and have a receipt for the purchase. However, the vendor tells me, via email, that the warranty is not valid without my taking a very convoluted series of computer actions, which my computer will not accomplish. The vendor essentially says "tough" this is what it is! So, I bought a warranty which I will not receive or be able to access, essentially wasting my money! Kenneth Davenny
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cost Effective 60"
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I can ascribe to this TV is due to the nature of its design - the edge lighting leaves 4 bright spots near the corners of the screen, though they are not overpowering. I don't even notice them anymore. This is an issue with this type of TV, not this model alone. So long as you know that going in, you'll be totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac G.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with refurbs, sometimes you get unlucky, but Amazon made it right. Good for them!
customer_reviews.text: I like it more now. 1st one shipped had a shattered screen. Amazon was quick to replace in 3 days. This one is missing a few parts that the first one had like proper mounting equipment for wall and batteries for remote, but I’ll just go purchase separately. Picture is great. Set up is easy with app. Im impressed now that its all hooked up. Was mad as hell when I got my first one and a little disappointed with the missing parts on replacement, but now Im happy and will be playing some COD tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Carr

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: This tv was barely 13 months when the screen started darkening on the right hand side, it started spreading and now it won’t even power up. I called Samsung and they said the warranty was 5 days over and they couldn’t fully honor it. They could only pay for the parts, I would have to pay for service. Its not even worth it. This thing is now trash.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Defected product
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered about a month ago.and I like to enjoy not too much of loud sound. My roommate figured out the other day that left side of speaker got glitch bass problems.it just I haven’t notice because I never turn it on with high volume.called Samsung customer service.thry said they r gonna send someone to look.im still waiting from their call to book an appointment...very disappointed.and I can’t say exactly whose fault.but I believe there’s higher chance the tv was originally defected but somehow made it to amazon?or amazons poor product handling gave this problem to tv(dropped products or any other shock from storing).i can’t tell.but I’m going thru waiting’s with customer care and it has been slow procedure..
customer_reviews.author: jin yang

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal TV
customer_reviews.text: I orignially ordered a Sceptra TV and it was garbage. Lesson Learned.....when buying a TV samsung or sony is the only way to go. This Samsung has the clearest picture I have ever laid eyes on. Everyone who comes over is like WOW what a picture! Easy to set up! So nice having the apps built into the TV instead of having to go through the playstation! LOVE LOVE LOVE this TV so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: brigitte biroscak

customer_reviews.title: Superb TV
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this TV. Picture and sound quality are superior. Would recommend it for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Transistor radio has better sound
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when we finally set it up and turned it on. The sound is an absolute joke. Absolutely no bass and no settings to adjust it - not even an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: An amazing Samsung TV!
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a amazing dislplay, perfect colors and the speakers are actually good. The shipping was fast and was undamaged. The TV was easy to install and the smart TV setup was simple and short. I highly recommend this TV to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alis-Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great Samsung 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: This 50" ( that's in inches ) is a great buy for it's video and audio quality, the only thing issue is the back of the flat screen, it curves and there are four (4) mounting holes, I wish there were more. Could've I drilled in additional holes, probably but I decided not too, and the pull-down bracket securely holds the TV. Not all TV's and mounting kits are universal, so that is really something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: TV online
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and it came very quickly. Easy install and ready to watch TV aagain. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Waldie Jr

customer_reviews.title: One Fine Television 50 inch
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was really surprised at the picture on this Samsung. It is bright brilliant and crisp. After owning older LCD tv's I was really happy to see the picture , sound and amount of inputs on this series 7. It is still lacking Bluetooth, but everything else exceeded my expatiations I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael &Tulay C

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had the Tv for a couple of months now and it was a great purchase. Looks great in my living room. Perfect size and picture quality. Love all the smart features. This televion was definitely an upgrade from my older HD tv. Highly recommend and good price.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: For the price. Ok
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a better picture but for the price it’s good enough, the sound is less than adequate, added a sound bar. Has other features I have not explored so much, cheap add ons. In a few years better tv for me.
customer_reviews.author: farmer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. For a year or so.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Would recommend. Update 08/16/2020: TV is 18 months old and screen is covered with dark shadows. Other online reviews showing Samsung having a major problem with their tv screen just after warranty expires. I will not buy any Samsung products until I've heard they've corrected their problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. User friendly. Our fifth Samsung TV. Will continue the trend.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: not sure what happened but now i have no TV
customer_reviews.text: as of today this TV no longer works was just about to eat my burger & the TV popped & started to smoke not a good thing to happen during this time i hope samsung or someone can reach out to me cuz almost cause a fire was kinda of expensive for me & i liked it to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fragile, horrible warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV for a few weeks. Picked it up carefully by the outer plastic bezel to dust. The screen no longer works. Had a Samsung tech out and he found an internal crack, thought it was a mfg defect that just took time to fail, but Samsung would do nothing under the warranty. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality for 4K bluray and netflix
customer_reviews.text: We use this 4K - 55 inch TV mostly for NetFlix and our Blu ray and 4K movies. Excellent clarity. We use this with our new Samsung 4K bluray player and our Yamaha 4K - AV receiver 7.2 ch. Together this tv enables netflix to be nearly cinema like picture quality. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Saturn

customer_reviews.title: Best TV Ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Samsung 55 inch smart t.v. Wonderful quality, sharpest picture of any we've ever had!!! People look like they're walking right into your living room! Theatre quality! Of course in my opinion, Samsung TVs are the best on the market! I'll never have another brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrydeg

customer_reviews.title: We've had this TV for a couple of months now and love it
customer_reviews.text: This one is highly recommended! We bought this on a Black Friday sale and it has been used in our bedroom. We liked it from the beginning but my husband mounted it on the wall and the picture is even more clear - was a snap to link to our Comcast cable remote - this one is quality and recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Utah-Treasures

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Video looks great when viewing 4k quality but looks blurry with lower quality video. At times video can seem a little glitchy. It is very stylish, ultra thin, and the screen seems to go all the way to the edges. Remote is kind of old school style and basic, the remote app is not very useful either. It would be great if you could type on your phone when using remote app for netflix and other apps. It is nice though, to be able to access all of your movie apps like netflix, prime, etc. directly on tv without having to use apple tv.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen and features, but missing bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung TVs and their overall picture quality being in the top tier for many years. I just bought this model to replace my Series 5. Easy to put together out of the box, bone simple to set up, and the technology in this series makes using the TV as a computer monitor much better. I give four stars only because it does not come with a built in bluetooth radio. I contacted Samsung support and the solution is to buy an optical bluetooth adapter, which is what I am going to do. Just do your research as a consumer before you click the buy it now button to make sure it has all the features you want.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Martwick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture with all the adjustments one could want - nested menus. Remembers most recent settings for startup, as well as by source, that is, can have different source settings for TV, Blue Ray movies, and other sources. Internal speakers are okay.
customer_reviews.author: RealiT

customer_reviews.title: Shipping box unacceptable for safe carrying
customer_reviews.text: Amazon replaced TV Samsung 55 inch 7100 right away since first delivered TV's box had a big hole on side seeing TV itself. I would suggest manufacturer to add some plastic strap handles on top . UPS drivers have no way to carry it safely. TV is great and excellent sound. Disadvantage is that does not have jacsk for audio/video out. You have to use only amp with HMDI in for amplification of sound if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tipsonko

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: I like having this as the first 4K tv in my house, great quality too compared to 1080p. The only issue that someone might encounter is that the tv is only capable of 2.4g WiFi instead of 5g WiFi. If you have a router that has both bands (Apples 2.4g, Apples 5g) then you can keep your phone on 5g and your tv on 2.4g and it will still work.
customer_reviews.author: Bartlomiej Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tv.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to order, easy to put up (you need two people), and intuitive to configure. The sound quality has been fine so far and the picture is very clear. I recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: ih

customer_reviews.title: Half the screen is dark
customer_reviews.text: This TV is not worth it what so ever. After a year and a half since purchased the whole half of the screen is completely dark. Waste of money. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it only displays about 32 inches out of the "50" i tried. all.the.Settings and nothing works
customer_reviews.author: thunder

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, needs the sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and get the sound bar. Only regret is no sound bar. Tv is incredible but lacks the volume to match the screen
customer_reviews.author: Mike Qualls

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great upgrade from our old 42" plasma tv, which is now in our master bedroom. It was delivered completely intact and ready to go. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Magee

customer_reviews.title: Product integrity question.
customer_reviews.text: Tv is extremely slow for a smart TV, the delays on the model I received are huge. They almost make the TV unusable and it’s running a bit hot.I am extremely upset as it was suppose to be a new tv.
customer_reviews.author: James King

customer_reviews.title: Screen burnout after year and a half
customer_reviews.text: This is a followup to my first review which wasn't great. Had it year and a half and have always bought Samsungs. I won't any more. Turned it on yesterday and screen burnout on the right side. I am extremely unhappy and will now buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brincks

customer_reviews.title: Should have researched more.
customer_reviews.text: Standing in front of this tv all is good. However, both sides of the screen appear a little less crisp and more cloudy than I would like. . I feel like I didn’t take such good care in picking out a 55 inch tv. I ha e a 46 inch Samsung and the picture quality is a 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: JLO

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: I put this TV in the Master Bedroom. Have not done anything with the wiring yet but that's next. My only complaint is that the sound is not as deep as my Samsung in the my older 52" which is in the living room purchased in 2009. You really can not go wrong with a Samsung. Picture looks good from all angles. Remote is more spartan than my older set but works.
customer_reviews.author: Netraider

customer_reviews.title: TV Is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically chose Samsung under the impression it would be a stronger long lasting TV instead of vizio. My son threw a tennis ball at the screen and it's now broken. Samsung TVs are so cheap they don't come close to standing out amongst the top competitors. Your paying for a plastic screen. The whole TV would bend if I moved it slightly. Durability is poor which made my 447 dollars go down the drain and I bought this TV for Christmas so you can see how frustrating this could be.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: Game mode! Gaming latancy lag
customer_reviews.text: GAME MODE. If you want to use this to game at all, it's a must. It's in settings external devices! Took forever to find
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: This TV sucks it disconnects from my network after 10 minutes of use will re-connect after rebooting and then the same thing happens. I plug in my firestick and no issues so it's not my network. It's the garbage tv from samsung. What's the point of a smart tv if you have to use an external device. Will never buy another samsung.
customer_reviews.author: kellenbach

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: bought this tv on sale. only complaint I have is when clicking to another channel, it takes a few second for the picture to clear up. it may just be because I am in the basement. overall I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: jaylina

customer_reviews.title: So far a great TV
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this TV for about a week. I haven't had any problems. It was an easy set up. I did adjust the picture by adjusting the brightness, contrast etc. I also adjusted the sound. I can hear the TV very well when set on volume 12. So far I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO BLUETOOTH!! 🤔
customer_reviews.text: THIS TV DOES NOT HAVE BLUETOOTH, CAMERA OR MICROPHONE!! I assumed, because it was 'smart' TV, it would at least have bluetooth. Not! Also no provision in firmware to install a bluetooth USB dongle in TV USB port. TV not so 'smart', nor is purchaser!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this tv is perfect. The picture quality is nice on 4K movies. The sound is a not really loud enough. The smart TV features are ok. It can connect to smartthing and also alexa. Overall it's a very nice TV. I am enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: This TV is like ‘being present’ in all broadcasts!!
customer_reviews.text: Most delicate and expensive purchase I’ve done of an item without first checking it in the showroom. The TV is amazing /perfect size/ colors impeccable/ easy to connect and do many features it will take me a while to enjoy them to the max /Love it👌🏻!!️
customer_reviews.author: miamiladybug

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this TV! It's the perfect size, picture quality is awesome and the smart features are great. It was a little out of my ideal price range but I think it was worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken screen shattered. Went to store and got a different brand. But I defiantly think the packaging for the TV was weak and should of been more substantial. Not retailers issue inunderstand more samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: Wpmaura

customer_reviews.title: Best tv
customer_reviews.text: This has been our best tv yet, and we bought it refurbished. No issues at all, and we have had it over a year now. Box and tv were just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people are complaining so much about this tv, it is a great tv, we have had it for a month and it has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Luis O.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase of this tv for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase of this Samsung TV for my master bedroom. Looks great, has a beautiful picture, was easy to mount, and very easy to use. I've had it for about 2 weeks now and no complaints. There were some comments about sound quality, but it is totally fine for a bedroom, no need for a soundbar or external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Artbook Collector

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV.
customer_reviews.text: Just a great TV, clear concise picture , easy to operate , full picture in antenna Mode or app mode . I had one question and called , I din't have to wait and was sone in 2 minutes . Great sound as well . Very Happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: wwnyguy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use wireless devices with this TV. No Wifi
customer_reviews.text: This TV does not have wifi connection for wireless devices such as headphones or sound bar. Would have not bought it if know this. I am suprised because TVs that are cheaper have this option.
customer_reviews.author: ahmad kabiri

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, picture and features and nice big screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV as a gift for my sister's new house and she absolutely loves it. Great quality, picture and features and nice big screen. Cheap for all you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: renee777

customer_reviews.title: Very bad color, cloudy picture, cannot tell the picture is white or gray.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not clear. You cannot tell the color gray or white, people face has 4 eyes and 2 noses at all time. Amazon has a completely different from the description from what really is. I would not buy this TV for $10.00.
customer_reviews.author: Zuloo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tv
customer_reviews.text: My only negative is that you have to sit directly in front of the TV, sit to the side and the picture is milky.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, quite large, and was able to get out of box and put together with one person. Only interesting thing is that the smart TV is unable to connect to '5G' WiFi — it only can connect to '2G' version of WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jabbour

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This tv stopped working after having it a few weeks after the 1 year anniversary. Warranty only lasts for a year. Probably would be better off finding a tv with a longer warranty
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: TV would not power up straight out of the box. Samsung recommended returning to Amazon and ordering another. I passed and opted to have a technician visit to repair. Power supply was dead, was replaced, and now it works fine. This is not something you should expect from a brand new TV.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Antonio Michelena

customer_reviews.title: No Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: izit's not as smart as it thinks it iz ... No Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had my own TV for a while, but when needing to finally put one on the wall - after a bit of research, this Samsung TV was one of the best. I knew that I wanted a clear, crisp, quality picture for watching all the sports. While there were other models that were less expensive the picture quality was subpar for what I wanted. I'm very pleased with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: joynoelle

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item and works really well. The price is a little high compare to other places if you shop around. But overall Samsung is excellent company when it comes to TV
customer_reviews.author: Al-amin o.

customer_reviews.title: Burn out
customer_reviews.text: After 17 months the tv overheated and no longer works. It was mounted on the wall with plenty of ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T Murphy

product_meta.title: Samsung 7 Series NU7100 50" - Flat 4K UHD Smart LED TV (2018)
product_meta.description: Step up from Full HD with the clarity of the Nu7100. Get 4x the resolution of Full HD, plus non 4k TV content is upscaled to 4K via a powerful UHD engine. This TV is a clear upgrade for your content. Power supply (V) AC110 120V 50/60Hz
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 7 Series NU7100 50" - Flat 4K UHD Smart LED TV (2018), One remote TM1240A with batteries, One power cable and One User Manual
TV Size without Stand: 44.3"W x 25.6"H x 2.4"D. TV Size with Stand: 44.3” W x 28.7” H x 10.3” D. TV Weight: 30 lb
Screen size: 49.5" Measured Diagonally. Resolution 3,840 x 2,160. Stand Size 1.7" W x 7.8" H x 10.3" D

An elegant slim design for a modern look you will admire. Enjoy millions of shades of color, fine-tuned to create an incredibly vibrant picture, which along the 120 Motion Rate, allows you to enjoy smooth action on fast moving content.

Please note the differences between the UN75NU7100 and the UN75NU710D; NU7100: Dark gray stand color, 450 nits HDR sustained brightness, Mega Dynamic Contrast; NU710D: Charcoal black stand color, 430 nits HDR sustained brightness, Ultra Dynamic Contrast. Both models do not support Bluetooth.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars451 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
